item.title: NESRM Init
item.description: NESRM | What and Why The “Never Ever Stable” Relationship Manager is an idea that I’ve been mulling over for a while now. I have a very specific use case that most CRM’s can’t model for me, atleast cheaply. All the different ideas and tasks can get overwhelming, so I hope trying to write some of it down might help. The Challenges & Solutions 1. Database A lot of this begins trivial.
